articles.author: India Today Sports Desk
articles.title: Ashes 4th Test, Day 5 weather forecast: Will rain spoil England's chance to level series? - India Today
articles.description: England will be hoping for favourable weather conditions to take remaining five Australian wickets on Sunday to give them a chance to level the series and create a thrilling finale to this enthralling Ashes battle.
articles.content: By India Today Sports Desk: The fourth Ashes Test between England and Australia at Old Trafford has reached a critical stage, with the weather playing a significant role in determining the outcome of… [+1802 chars]
